skills.name: Breathe Fire
skills.description: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

skills.name: Dragon Tail
skills.description: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

skills.name: Dragon Blood
skills.description: Slyrak's blood still courses through Davion's veins, giving him twice the vitality of an ordinary knight.

skills.name: Elder Dragon Form
skills.description: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing and slowing enemy units in an area while causing them to miss on most attacks. Lasts 6 seconds.

skills.name: Blink Strike
skills.description: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

skills.name: Backstab
skills.description: If Riki attacks from behind, bonus damage is applied based on his current agility.

skills.name: Permanent Invisibility
skills.description: Riki fades into the shadows, staying permanently invisible except while attacking or using abilities.Riki is no longer revealed when he casts spells or uses items. While silenced, Riki will be visible.

skills.name: Waveform
skills.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.

skills.name: Adaptive Strike
skills.description: Strikes an enemy unit with a blast of water. If Morphling's dominant attribute is Agility...

skills.name: Morph Agility Gain
skills.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility.

skills.name: Replicate
skills.description: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's...
